chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini has a problem:

It wasn't exactly the product I wanted.

Thank you,
When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable electronics and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to process a refund if it proceeds.
nThe customer meets the following requirements to make the return:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or drop.
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data.
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for portable electronics and home appliances) to repair or substitute the article and 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
CH
